LiftShift
https://liftshift.app/

LiftShift is a free, privacy-focused workout analytics dashboard. It converts workout logs (Hevy, Strong, Lyfta etc) into readable charts and summaries like training volume, consistency, muscle emphasis, and personal records.

What LiftShift does:
- Import workout data from supported apps
- Compute analytics locally in your browser
- Show dashboards for training volume, PRs, exercise history, and muscle emphasis

What LiftShift does not do:
- It is not a workout plan generator
- It does not provide medical advice
- It does not store your full training history on a LiftShift server

Key pages:
- https://liftshift.app/about/
- https://liftshift.app/how-it-works/
- https://liftshift.app/privacy/
- https://liftshift.app/faq/
- https://liftshift.app/supported-apps/
- https://liftshift.app/metrics/
- https://liftshift.app/ai/

App:
- https://liftshift.app/ (interactive web app)
